name: Carrier
description:
With 'Striker' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: Oberon Prime: Update 20.7.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed disarming Corpus Power Carriers resulting in their Provas floating outside of their hands.

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Update 19.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Carrier's Ammo Case Mod being exploitable.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ammo Case still applying its buffs after Carrier has died.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a potential issue causing pickups to become stuck to the Carrier Sentinel as a Host.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.changes: Enabled Scavenger Drones, Sapping Ospreys, Leech Ospreys, Mine Ospreys, and Mutalist Osprey Carriers in the Simulacrum.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.6.1
patchlogs.changes: Infested Carrier Drones now have a unique explosion FX.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed projectiles from Infested Carriers in the J-3 Golem fight not properly dealing damage to players.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.changes: T3S Rotation C: Forma BP for Prime Carrier BP.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier pulling items towards players while on a Rampart.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Carrier's Vacuum will no longer pick up items while the player is bleeding out.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where ammo pickups mutated by Hosts would confuse Clients-side Carriers as per: https://forums.warframe.com/index.php?/topic/480877-carrier-looting-bug-ammo-clicking/

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Prime’s Carapace description reading the description for Wyrm Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.11: Ash Prime + Hotfix 16.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Ash, Vectis and Carrier parts not dropping for players in the Void.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.9.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Para Carrier skin showing code in its description.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.6.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed items vacuumed in by the Carrier becoming stuck to the Carrier.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.6.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Carrier Sentinels not sucking in Sigils and other item drops.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Carrier’s Vacuum not picking up Pigments.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Sentinel dragging items that have not (or cannot) be claimed, following the player forever.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Stamina orbs in the Dojo becoming vacuumed up by Carrier for eternity.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Corpus Power Carrier appearing twice in the Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 14.0.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier sentinel being seemingly 1 hit killed by enemy Kubrows and Volatile Infested.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem deco positions on Carrier and Djinn sentinels.

name: Carrier Prime
description: This ornate sentinel is an excellent example of late Orokin craftsmanship and styling.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed disarming Corpus Power Carriers resulting in their Provas floating outside of their hands.

name: Dethcube
description:
With 'Swift Deth' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: Update 9.8
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect emblem decorations on Dethcube

patchlogs.name: Update 9.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed incorrect emblem decorations on Dethcube.

name: Diriga
description:
Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Diriga and Vulklok missing from the Codex.

name: Djinn
description:
With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.additions: Added back Djinn’s buff icon in the form of a Corrosive Proc icon.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix 1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed gifting not working for the Djinn Deluxe Bundle (Gazal Complete Collection).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Djinn being unable to mesmerize enemies without guns (eg: melee-only units).

patchlogs.name: Update 18.4.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Djinn's Fatal Attraction mesmerising targets that cannot target the player.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.2.0
patchlogs.changes: Djinn’s Fatal Attraction will now ignore security cameras.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Djinn’s Fatal Attraction ability not functioning on ragdolled enemies.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: The Djinn’s Fatal Attraction ability now makes all enemies approach the Djinn.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.5.0: Edo Armor & Nami Solo
patchlogs.changes: Fixed issues with many Sentinel precepts having their priority subverted by other slotted precepts. Example, if you ever noticed your Djinn would never seem to cast Fatal Attraction, it is likely because it was slotted in the 2nd/3rd/4th Precept Slot and was not properly prioritized.

patchlogs.name: Update 10.3.0: Hump Day!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed emblem deco positions on Carrier and Djinn sentinels.

name: Helios Prime
description: This knowledge hungry protector defends its master with Deconstructor Prime.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Hotfix 22.17.4
patchlogs.changes: Optimized Helios' Investigator Precept: it should now find targets more than 10x faster and no longer causes periodic spikes in frame-time as high as 7ms.

patchlogs.name: The Pacifism Defect: Update 19.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed being able to equip Deconstructor on a Sentinel that is not Helios.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a bug where non-Helios Sentinels could equip the Deconstructor when randomizing their loadout.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios being able to scan Oddities.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios being able to scan Oddities.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios not attacking enemies when equipped with the Deconstructor.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Helios caused by viewing another player’s profile then entering a Mission, causing Helios to count scans from other player’s completed Codex.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Helios not scanning properly.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.fixes: Simplified Helios' scan logic to avoid a bunch of heavy-lifting that is already done by native code.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.4.1
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an issue with Helios' incorrectly scanning objects outside of the players aim as well as objects whose Codex entry is already complete. Helio sfix, Codex entries for crates will follow.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.3.0: Pack Hunters
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Helios' Investigator Precept not properly displaying/calculating its max rank and perpetually behaving like a rank 0 mod. It will also receive a target lock so it doesn’t Get distracted during scans so easily.

patchlogs.name: Update 12.5.0: Helios
patchlogs.changes: Update 12.5.0: Helios:

name: Prisma Shade
description: A rare jewel of the void. How could anything so beautiful be crafted for stealth?

name: Shade
description:
With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Gara's Splinter Storm not dealing damage while invisible (Shade, Huras, Octavia etc).

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Update 21.2.0 + 21.2.0.1
patchlogs.changes: Approximated certain lighting calculations when using Low Shader Quality to improve performance; this will be most helpful for the Earth tileset because of the day/night cycle but there should be improvements throughout all remastered tilesets.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.0.5
patchlogs.changes: Optimized mission loading slightly for people using High Shader Quality.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue allowing Shade Sentinel and Huras Kubrow cloaks to stealth players still firing weapons with large magazines.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.5.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Shade Sentinel’s Ghost and the Hura's Stalk Ability not properly functioning.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 13.1.2
patchlogs.changes: Scaled the Wings and Tail of the Shade Sentinel when using the Sprite skin.

name: Taxon
description:
With 'Retarget' and 'Molecular Conversion' as its default Precepts, Taxon protects its owner with shield restoration. Equipped with the Artax ice-beam.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: Banshee Prime: Hotfix 19.11.5 + 19.11.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not receiving the Vacuum Mod upon crafting Taxon. You should receive the Vacuum Mod upon relog!

patchlogs.name: The Glast Gambit: Hotfix 19.10.1+19.10.1.1
patchlogs.changes: Tweaked Taxon’s Molecular Conversion’s damage conversion value (per rank) to 50, 75, 100, 125, 150, 200 (previously 50, 100, 150, 200, 200, 200).

name: Wyrm
description:
With 'Warrior' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.
Note: This item requires two open slots.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Warframe’s first Prime Sentinel, Wyrm Prime, has had its base Health increased from 100 to 225!

patchlogs.name: Update 18.12.0: Vauban Prime & 18.12.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed Wyrm Prime Blueprint from T2 Exterminate reward table.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.4.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error in Wyrmius’ loading screen causing an oversized Liset to appear instead of a Wyrm.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.3
patchlogs.changes: Fixed an error causing no enemies to spawn in Wyrmius.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a permanent motion blur effect that would occur after the second room in Wyrmius.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.changes: Wyrm Prime now has 150 base Armor.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.11.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Carrier Prime’s Carapace description reading the description for Wyrm Prime.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Sanctuary
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Wyrmius respawning behind a wall if the player died behind a wall.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Wyrmius being able to shoot during respawn period.

patchlogs.name: Update 13.7.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Wyrm Prime Blueprint not being tradeable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 9.4: Double Affinity Weekend!
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes for badges on Wyrm and DethCube being offset.

name: Wyrm Prime
description: Both bodyguard and status symbol, the Wyrm Prime Sentinel was the last line of defense for high ranking Tenno in the Orokin Era.

patchlogs.name: Hydroid Prime: Update 21.6.0
patchlogs.changes: Warframe’s first Prime Sentinel, Wyrm Prime, has had its base Health increased from 100 to 225!

patchlogs.name: Update 18.12.0: Vauban Prime & 18.12.1
patchlogs.changes: Removed Wyrm Prime Blueprint from T2 Exterminate reward table.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Wyrmius respawning behind a wall if the player died behind a wall.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Wyrmius being able to shoot during respawn period.

patchlogs.fixes: Fixed issue with Wyrm Prime Blueprint not being tradeable.
